ingredients: 1 cup all-purpose flour, 1 cup white sugar,   +   1/4 teaspoon salt, 2 cups cranberries,   +   1/2 cup chopped walnuts,   +   1/2 cup butter, melted, 2 large eggs, beaten, 1 teaspoon almond extract
nutrition: Total Fat 18g 23%, Saturated Fat 8g 41%, Cholesterol 77mg 26%, Sodium 173mg 8%, Total Carbohydrate 41g 15%, Dietary Fiber 2g 8%, Total Sugars 26g, Protein 5g, Vitamin C 4mg 19%, Calcium 22mg 2%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 93mg 2%
